wordpressPost.title: How Much of a Positive Impact Does WeSpire Really Make?
wordpressPost.content:
We work with some of the most innovative companies in the world, and we love to talk about the amazing efforts they have put forth to create a better, more sustainable world.
Last year alone, WeSpire users logged nearly two million actions on the WeSpire platform, saving nearly a quarter million gallons of fuel and more than 118 million gallons of water.
Check out the graphic to see the full list of savings that WeSpire users have generated.
We’re able to measure the impact of sustainability-related actions that users take at work and home using the powerful sustainability ROI calculator feature of the platform.
This year WeSpire also launched its Events tool which makes it easy for companies to coordinate positive business events such as volunteer days, food and clothing drives, company-wide events and more. We’re excited to report that our customers logged 45,000 volunteer hours in 2016 using this tool.
As we move into 2017, people around the world are chasing after purpose-driven work and employers are looking for ways to provide this all while demonstrating every employee’s positive impact at work and the collective positive impact the business has on society.
We can’t wait to see what our customers do this year! Are you ready to take your positive business programs to the next level this year? Or are you interested in learning more about the positive business revolution? Whatever it is, we’d love to talk with you!
